title.narrative: North-South Road Corridor Investment Program - Tranche 2

description.narrative: Project 2 of the investment program will contribute to socioeconomic development in Armenia and expanded regional trade. The outcome will be an efficient, safe, and sustainable north-south road corridor, linking Armenia domestically and internationally. The project output will be an upgraded 44 km section between Ashtarak and Talin.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Territorial Administration and Infrastructure
Ministry of Transport, Communication and Information Technologies
"Road Department" State Non-Commercial Organization (formerly "Transport Project Implementation Organization" State Non-Commercial Organization)

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and sustainable north-south road corridor, linking Armenia domestically and internationally

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
By 2023, reduced travel time from Yerevan to Talin to 1.00 hour from 1.33 hours in 2009

description.narrative: An efficient, safe, and sustainable north-south road corridor, linking Armenia domestically and internationally

title.narrative: By 2023, increased daily traffic from Ashtarak to Talin to 9,400 vehicles from 5,800 vehicles in 2009
